title: An apologie for poetrie. VVritten by the right noble, vertuous, and learned, Sir Phillip Sidney, Knight
author: Sidney, Philip, Sir, 1554-1586.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by James Roberts] for Henry Olney, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the George, neere to Cheap-gate,
